title: Don't Stop The Music
author: Rihanna
lyrics:
[00:11.74] Please don't stop the music (music, music, music, music)
[00:19.44] Please don't stop the music (music, music, music, music)
[00:26.30] Please don't stop the music (music, music, music, music)
[00:26.60] Please don't stop the music (music, music, music, music)
[00:28.50] It's gettin' late, I'm making my way over to my favorite place
[00:33.97] I gotta get my body moving, shake the stress away
[00:37.67] I wasn't looking for nobody when you looked my way
[00:41.74] Possible candidate, yeah
[00:44.34] Who knew that you'd be up in here lookin' like you do?
[00:49.54] You're making stayin' over here impossible
[00:53.52] Baby, I'ma say your aura is incredible
[00:57.17] If you don't have to go, don't
[00:59.88] Do you know what you started? I just came here to party
[01:03.70] But now we're rockin' on the dance floor, actin' naughty
[01:07.75] Your hands around my waist, just let the music play
[01:11.90] We're hand in hand, chest to chest, and now we're face to face
[01:15.87] I wanna take you away
[01:18.07] Let's escape into the music, DJ, let it play
[01:22.08] I just can't refuse it, like the way you do this
[01:26.38] Keep on rockin' to it
[01:28.23] Please don't stop the, please don't stop the music
[01:31.01] I wanna take you away
[01:33.54] Let's escape into the music, DJ, let it play
[01:37.61] I just can't refuse it, like the way you do this
[01:41.52] Keep on rockin' to it
[01:43.74] Please don't stop the, please don't stop the, please don't stop the music
[01:48.54] Baby, are you ready? 'Cause it's getting close
[01:52.15] Don't you feel the passion ready to explode?
[01:56.32] What goes on between us, no one has to know
[01:59.76] This is a private show, oh
[02:02.58] Do you know what you started? I just came here to party
[02:06.76] But now we're rockin' on the dance floor, actin' naughty
